tool_description: Establishes and manages authenticated connections to multiple music platforms and media outlets for data retrieval, handling API credentials and connection status monitoring.

platform_name.description: Name of the platform to connect to (e.g., Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, ASCAP, BMI)

api_credentials.description: Array of credential strings (API keys, tokens, secrets)

error_messages: Invalid credentials: Provided API credentials are invalid or expired. Check with platform provider for valid credentials.
Platform not supported: The specified platform is not currently supported. Use supported platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, ASCAP, BMI.
Connection timeout: Failed to establish connection within timeout period. Check network connectivity and increase timeout if needed.
usage: Provide platform_name and api_credentials array. Optionally set connection_timeout. Use this tool first to establish connections before retrieving usage data from any platform.

connection_id.description: Unique identifier for the established connection

connection_status.description: Status of the connection (active, failed, expired)

platform_capabilities.description: List of available data types from this platform
